channel.title: Object gives item? (317)
channel.description:
What im trying to do is make an object give an item but only when an item is used on it. E.G use key ---> chest --> receive 100m.
Any body any ideas of what the code would be to do that? And if so am i right in thinking it would go in the Client.java file?

item.title: Object gives item? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Thanks very much

item.title: Object gives item? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Yes client.java is where you would put it.

if(UsedOnObjectID == ** && ItemID == ** && playerLevel[13] >= **){ deleteItem(451, 1); addItem(2363, 1); sM("message here."); setAnimation(**); //mess around with the animation. }

Replace the ** to your numbers.
